title: Market Capitalization and Valuation Metrics of Factset Research Systems Inc Stock

content.text: Factset Research Systems Inc has a market capitalization of $32.17 billion.
1. Price-to-Earnings (P/E) Ratio: The P/E ratio of Factset Research Systems Inc is 34.76, compared to the industry average of 36.89.
2. Price-to-Sales (P/S) Ratio: The P/S ratio of Factset Research Systems Inc is 6.92, compared to the industry average of 5.57.
3. Price-to-Book (P/B) Ratio: The P/B ratio of Factset Research Systems Inc is 10.21, compared to the industry average of 4.93.
4. Dividend Yield: The dividend yield of Factset Research Systems Inc is 0.89%, compared to the industry average of 1.21%.
5. Return on Equity (ROE): The ROE of Factset Research Systems Inc is 46.57%, compared to the industry average of 22.38%.
6. Earnings per Share (EPS): The EPS of Factset Research Systems Inc is $9.01, compared to the industry average of $6.58.
7. Debt-to-Equity Ratio: The debt-to-equity ratio of Factset Research Systems Inc is 1.15, compared to the industry average of 0.77.
